posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
Its not a mismatch in TDS, there was a BS degree domain wide DNS server failure, which meant that all emails got delayed for a day and the domain (ds.study.iitm.ac.in) itself became unreachable for that time.

Just sayin!

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva

Thanks for the update! It would be nice if others gave updates instead of leaving us to wonder what’s going on even though they have received the mail.

Kind regards
